original_text: Associate yourselves, O ye people, and ye shall be broken in pieces; and give ear, all ye of far countries: gird yourselves, and ye shall be broken in pieces; gird yourselves, and ye shall be broken in pieces.
korean_text: 너희 민족들아 함성을 질러 보아라 그러나 끝내 패망하리라 너희 먼 나라 백성들아 들을지니라 너희 허리를 동이라 그러나 끝내 패망하리라 너희 허리에 띠를 띠라 그러나 끝내 패망하리라

sentences.original_text: and ye shall be broken in pieces
and give ear, all ye of far countries
sentences.korean_translation: 멀리 있는 모든 나라들아, 귀를 기울이라

sentences.original_text: and ye shall be broken in pieces
and ye shall be broken in pieces
